website_summaries.verdict: For owners who seek an affordable and environment-friendly dog cologne, this is definitely one to consider.
pros: Uses only non-toxic, natural ingredients and no alcohol
Propellant is compressed air, safer for environment
Pleasant spring-clean fragrance.Can be applied in any direction
cons: A heavier application may be required for best results
Effects described as temporary by some owners

customer_reviews.title: Works very well
customer_reviews.text: We use this on all three of our dogs ranging from 11 pounds up to 80 pounds. Works very well at eliminating that very particular odor dogs aquire after a romp outside, without being overly fragranced.
customer_reviews.author: Kellie

customer_reviews.title: For huggable hounds, I highly recommend this spray!
customer_reviews.text: I am a long time professional groomer who has favored products, but I quickly added this to my personal Amazon order, to hold me over at work, until I put in an order with my grooming supply distributor. I was VERY pleasantly surprised at how nice a finishing spray this is. The scent is incredibly pleasant, and as others said, not too heavy. Makes the dogs perfectly huggable!
customer_reviews.author: Ann V

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I love this spray. I live in the desert, and the acre that our puppy runs on is mostly dirt. That means 1 day after a bath she doesnt smell good. This stuff is great for when guests are coming by so guests dont think I skip bathing her. I like the smell, and her black/white coat doesnt feel like it's got a coating on it after being sprayed.
customer_reviews.author: Mypublicname

customer_reviews.title: Smells so good.
customer_reviews.text: My dog just plain stinks after going for a run. This returns her to her more acceptable status of dog instead of stink-ball.
customer_reviews.author: vj2400

customer_reviews.title: Good price and a very faint scent
customer_reviews.text: It’s ok for the price. It took longer than usual to get this and I am satisfied with it, but not super amazed. It doesn’t have much of a smell which is either a good or bad thing depending on what you’re looking for. The Pet Head doggy cologne is a better product and has a better and stronger scent. If you want something very simple and lightly scented, then this is a good choice. I probably wouldn’t buy again, but I’m not disappointed with this, I just prefer the other kind better.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Best of the doggy deodorizers I’ve tried
customer_reviews.text: We bought 3 cans of this stuff, one for the truck, one for the camper, and one for home. This spray works really well between baths when our pup has been running around outside and has that “dog” smell. It doesn’t seem to bother her, and doesn’t dry out her skin. I use it like dry shampoo-spray on, rub in and towel off. I also lightly spray her bed between washings as a deodorizer. It has a light, clean, fresh smell.
customer_reviews.author: S. Hall

customer_reviews.title: Eh dry shampoo for humans does same - doesn’t leave dog wet
customer_reviews.text: I use the Not Your Mothes Dry Shampoo typically, other brands too as my dog loves to roll in all things smelly. This spray is wetter than a dry shampoo. My dog seems to like the not wet feeling better. With this wet spray she’ll want to roll in the carpet or on the bed etc to dry off. Dry shampoo is of course, dry and has great scents. This is more of a neutralizer than a cologne as advertised. It does the job, but I wouldn’t re-purchase for these reasons.
customer_reviews.author: bek

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great for a quick mist on a smelly dog. My big girl smells she gets it morning and night.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I like to refresh my dogs fur every time I groom them. One week it's bath wash wipes and the next it's Mist Spray from Out! Just spray and brush and they smell terrific! The seller Mammy Stork did a fantastic job packaging and sending. I will certainly buy from them again.
customer_reviews.author: LuckyPatty

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last long
customer_reviews.text: I like the smell but it doesn't last very long. Maybe a few hours or so. It's great before visitors are coming over but wish it lasted longer.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Blocker

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay
customer_reviews.text: Smells okay, but leaves a sticky coating on dog even though it is sprayed from a distance. My dog is dark colored and there was a viable residue on him when I used this.
customer_reviews.author: A. Leonard

customer_reviews.title: Buy from another seller
customer_reviews.text: Works great just wish they didn’t price gouge me by charging me over $10 for this when it’s normally $3.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriela

customer_reviews.title: Dog perfume ❤️
customer_reviews.text: Smells so good. It helps my doggies freshen up o let issue is I wish it lasted longer and was a bigger bottle. I spray them after being outside because for some reason outdoor odor sticks to your pets and after a bath. Smells like a clean dog.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Great smelling!
customer_reviews.text: This is great to help your fur friend smell really good
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pleasant smell
customer_reviews.text: Smell is pleasant. I’m not a fan of rubbing into my dog just because my hand gets co as ted with wet loose fur, but it does work between baths for my lab chow boy
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Safe and not obnoxious smelling..
customer_reviews.text: This I good for my Bassett. He really stinks even with frequent baths. I wish it would negate odor longer, but I get quite a bit of relief from using this. I appreciate having it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mist
customer_reviews.text: Love this product it does keep my dog from getting baths every week. The product has a wonderful sent and last a good while.
customer_reviews.author: Mary F. Stitely

customer_reviews.title: This doggy cologne has a very clean scent
customer_reviews.text: I like this product it has a clean scent and my 2 dogs smell great. I just wish it was a larger size. I recommend this doggy cologne really like the clean scent.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Surace

customer_reviews.title: Puppy and owner approved
customer_reviews.text: This works great for our lab who is indoor outdoor puppy. She didn't like the pump spray products because of the wetness. She doesn't mind this aerosol spray at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: This is a light nice sent for after bath and lasts a while I have used it several times
customer_reviews.author: Betty Griffith

customer_reviews.title: Great Pruduct! Excellent Price!  5 Star +++
customer_reviews.text: I'm very impressed with this product. My dog smells great and he doesn't mind it being sprayed on. Incredible value for the money! I highly recommend this product!!
customer_reviews.author: M.

customer_reviews.title: Jody
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product because it takes care of the dog smell as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Jody Eubank

customer_reviews.title: Great looking coat after.
customer_reviews.text: Keeps coat shiny and well conditioned. But sent does not last over 2 days. But its worth it for a very nice looking coat, and does not irritate a puppies skin.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin Sperling

customer_reviews.title: Smells awesome and last for days
customer_reviews.text: Smells great and last a long time!! My only complaint that it takes so long to get after you order!
customer_reviews.author: Patti Fuss

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: works well on our springer and it doesn't irritate her like other sprays do
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Wish it lasted longer or they made some kind of moisture cream to stick better?! Love it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves it! And we do too!
customer_reviews.text: When my dog sees me grabbing the bottle he walks to me and then stands still so that I can mist him! he loves it! And he smells so much better :-)
customer_reviews.author: TRT

customer_reviews.title: It is what it says it is.
customer_reviews.text: Cheap perfume for dogs. Works for the moment but not long lasting. Which is fine with me. It covers up the after bath smell so that’s good enough.
customer_reviews.author: tomeka

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My dog goes swimming every morning, this takes away the wet dog smell.
customer_reviews.author: sheila

customer_reviews.title: Axe for dogs!
customer_reviews.text: We love this spray for Bodhi Bear - super quick and easy to use between baths. It’s like Ace body spray for dogs! Bought three!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Rifkin

customer_reviews.title: Love this Deoderizer for Dogs
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 dogs. I use this product on all of them. Favorite pet deoderizer on the market.
customer_reviews.author: asembera

customer_reviews.title: Horrible.
customer_reviews.text: Doesnt work. Doesnt "neutralize and eliminate" dog odor like it states. Doesnt have a long lasting smell, unless you describe 3-5 minutes as long lasting....
customer_reviews.author: Shelly

customer_reviews.title: OUT! Dog Cologne Body Mist Spray | Dog Perfume |
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't last as long as I thought it would. It has a good smell and is easy to apply

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Really great for touch ups in between baths. Smells great!

customer_reviews.title: Great smell, love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love the smell, has lasted a long time for me. I dont use it everyday but once a week or when needed. I spray it on my dogs brush and I brush him with it so he doesnt get soaked in spray. I will buy again.

customer_reviews.title: Smells good but doesn't last long
customer_reviews.text: Smells good but didnt last long after putting it on my dogs

customer_reviews.title: Pricey way to scare dogs
customer_reviews.text: Scares the hell out of my dogs and hardly has any scent to it

customer_reviews.title: Great scent!
customer_reviews.text: This scent is awesome and helps my dogs smell so good!! It’s a clean smell and not overpowering. Easy to spray. Lasts a good amount of time. Happy with purchase!

customer_reviews.title: Great convenient way to get your dog's fur a nice ...
customer_reviews.text: Great convenient way to get your dog's fur a nice smell free sheen without the typical shampoo experience when time is short. Love this product.

customer_reviews.title: This works!!
customer_reviews.text: Just a once over between bathes and it keeps your pet from getting too smelly. The scent is great. ( I bought and used both scents)

customer_reviews.title: but it could be my stinky dog that overpowers anything smelling nice =/
customer_reviews.text: I wish the smell lasted longer, but it could be my stinky dog that overpowers anything smelling nice =/

customer_reviews.title: Nice Smell
customer_reviews.text: Finally I can pet my dogs and not hold my breath

customer_reviews.title: Not for our sensitive skin dog
customer_reviews.text: Our dog has a thin coat and sensitive skin and reacted to this spray (little welts on his skin). Might be fine for thicker coated/non-sensitive dogs.

customer_reviews.title: Good for between groomings/baths
customer_reviews.text: This helps keep my Shih Tzu --who is not a fan of baths = smelling good between baths and grooming sessions. I brush him, then spray this stuff and it definitely knocks down doggie odor.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this spray for my dogs! It smells great and keeps them smelling great in between baths. I love how fine the mist is and how easy it is to spray .

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works and smells great! I love it
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works and smells great! I love it! My two dogs are always so stinky from outside and I just give them a little spray and the odor is gone!

I definitely recommend this product.

product_meta.title: OUT! Dog Cologne Body Mist Spray | Dog Perfume | Refreshes Coat and Controls Odor Between Baths | 6.3 Ounces
product_meta.description: Color:Spring FreshOUT! Spring Fresh Dog Body Mist (6.3 oz) keeps your dog smelling fresh in between baths with a long lasting spring fresh scent. Spring Fresh dog perfume spray safely neutralizes and eliminates dog odors (with no alcohol or dyes) while also conditioning your dog's coat. OUT! dog body spray cologne uses only compressed air, so it can spray upside down and upside right with a startle-free, gentle, and continious mist. Made in the USA. Directions for Use: Spray dog's coat as needed while avoiding face and eyes. Apply until coat is damp but not wet for maximum de-stinking. Brush gently. Delay next doggy bath.
feature_bullets: OUT! Spring Mist Dog Body Mist keeps your dog smelling fresh in between baths with a long lasting spring fresh scent
Spring Fresh dog perfume safely neutralizes and eliminates your dog's odors (with no alcohol or dyes) while also conditioning their coat
Uses only compressed air, so dog body spray cologne can spray upside down and upside right with a startle-free, gentle, and continious mist
